title: Part 103 - Principle-Based Reserving
content:
Part 103 - Principle-Based Reserving

State Regulations
§ 103.1 - Purpose
§ 103.2 - Superintendent's authority to require reserve adjustments
§ 103.3 - Superintendent's authority to require adjustments from the valuation manual
§ 103.4 - Valuation of individual term life insurance and individual certificates issued under a group term life contract
§ 103.5 - Valuation of payout annuity reserves
§ 103.6 - Valuation of variable annuity and hybrid annuity reserves
§ 103.7 - Valuation of all other reserves
§ 103.8 - Reinsurance

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
